attachments.fallback:
[January 3rd, 2017 12:31 PM] garisingh: BTW - for folks working on Fabric development, you might be interested in this recently merged build feature:    <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3555/>

See the commit for details, but basically it allows you to run  unit-tests for a list of packages rather than running the whole suite.  It's nice as a pre-test before submitting to quickly ensure that your tests will pass in the CI environment without having to run all the unit-tests for all packages
attachments.text:
BTW - for folks working on Fabric development, you might be interested in this recently merged build feature:    <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3555/>

See the commit for details, but basically it allows you to run  unit-tests for a list of packages rather than running the whole suite.  It's nice as a pre-test before submitting to quickly ensure that your tests will pass in the CI environment without having to run all the unit-tests for all packages
